node.title: Appeal for information after man shot in Auckland CBD
node.description: Police officers found an injured man and a vehicle damaged by gunshots at the scene.
node.content: ["A police investigation is underway after a man sustained moderate injuries in a central Auckland shooting overnight.\n", "The shooting happened on Nelson St at about 1:25am.", "Det Snr Sgt Khush Kullar, of Auckland city, said when police officers arrived at the scene they found a vehicle damaged by gunshots.", "Officers then located a man with gunshot injuries on his hand.", "\"He was taken to Auckland City Hospital in a moderate condition and is being spoken to by police,\" Kullar said.", "A scene examination was taking place on Monday, said Kullar.", "He said no one has been arrested at this stage.", "The residents of nearby apartments also \"may have filmed the incident or part of it\", and are being asked to come forward.", "\"Anyone with information that may assist our enquiries is asked to contact police on 105 quoting the file number 211220/9061,\" Kullar said.", "\"Information can also be provided anonymously through Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111.\""]
